title: E-Commerce Platform Redesign
description: Complete redesign of a modern e-commerce platform with enhanced UX and performance optimization.
longDescription: Led a comprehensive redesign of a high-traffic e-commerce platform, improving conversion rates by 35% and reducing bounce rate by 28%. The project involved user research, wireframing, prototyping, and implementation of a modern design system with accessibility-first approach.

title: Mobile Banking App
description: Secure and intuitive mobile banking application with biometric authentication.
longDescription: Designed and developed a comprehensive mobile banking app featuring secure authentication, real-time transactions, and intuitive financial management tools. Implemented advanced security measures and ensured compliance with financial regulations.

title: Brand Identity & Design System
description: Complete brand identity design for a sustainable fashion startup.
longDescription: Created a comprehensive brand identity including logo design, color palette, typography, and design system for a sustainable fashion startup. The brand identity reflects the company's eco-friendly values while maintaining modern appeal.

title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for a B2B SaaS platform.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, custom reporting tools, and advanced filtering capabilities. The dashboard helps businesses make data-driven decisions with intuitive charts and interactive elements.

title: Restaurant Website & Online Ordering
description: Modern restaurant website with integrated online ordering system.
longDescription: Designed and developed a responsive restaurant website featuring online menu, reservation system, and integrated online ordering. The site includes admin panel for menu management and order tracking.

title: Fitness Tracking Mobile App
description: Comprehensive fitness tracking app with workout plans and progress monitoring.
longDescription: Created a feature-rich fitness tracking mobile app with workout plans, progress tracking, social features, and integration with wearable devices. The app includes gamification elements to encourage user engagement.
